description: <p>Designed for sporty adventurers looking for accessible and high-performance poles, Salomon's ESCAPE ALU Nordic hiking model combines comfort and durability with recycled materials that will last many seasons. <br><br>Nordic touring poles are suitable for skiers who enjoy exploring groomed trails, ungroomed terrain, and variable snow conditions. Nordic touring poles are generally made of aluminum or a combination of aluminum and composite materials to withstand the demands of varied terrain.<br><br>Discover dependable performance with regular pendulum Nordic poles. Designed for consistent forward and backward movement, these poles offer reliable skiing dynamics. Ideal for a wide range of skiers seeking a straightforward and effective pole motion. Elevate your skiing with poles that provide a stable experience.<br><br>Unleash power and precision with rigid Nordic poles. Designed for optimal power transmission, these poles optimize performance to provide dynamic steps. Perfect for skiers looking to optimize their speed and efficiency. Take it to the next level with poles adapted to your quest for optimal performance.<br>Get started on your cross-country skiing journey with our beginner-friendly equipment. Designed to facilitate learning and guarantee stability, our skis offer fluid gliding. Our comfortable shoes offer good support, while our simple bindings ensure secure control. Improve your technique with equipment that grows with you.</p>
name: Escape Alu Poles
